Package se.swedenconnect.ca.engine.ca.repository

Interface CARepository

  • public interface CARepository
    Interface for implementing a CA repository.
    Author:
    Martin Lindstr√∂m (martin@idsec.se), Stefan Santesson (stefan@idsec.se)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCertificate​(org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder certificate)
      Add a certificate to the certificate repository.
      List<BigInteger> getAllCertificates()
      Gets a list of all current certificate serial numbers of certificates in the repository.
      CertificateRecord getCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber)
      Gets the certificate data associated with a certificate serial number.
      int getCertificateCount​(boolean notRevoked)
      Get the number of certificates in the certificate repository.
      List<CertificateRecord> getCertificateRange​(int page, int pageSize, boolean notRevoked, SortBy sortBy, boolean descending)
      Get a range of certificates from the certificate repository.
      CRLRevocationDataProvider getCRLRevocationDataProvider()
      Get CRL revocation data provider.
      List<BigInteger> removeExpiredCerts​(int gracePeriodSeconds)
      Remove all expired certificates that has been expired for at least the specified grace period.
      void revokeCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber, int reason, Date revocationTime)
      Revoke a certificate at a particular date at a particular time.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllCertificates

        List<BigInteger> getAllCertificates()
        Gets a list of all current certificate serial numbers of certificates in the repository.
        Returns:
        list of certificate serial numbers

      • getCertificate

        CertificateRecord getCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber)
        Gets the certificate data associated with a certificate serial number.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - certificate serial number
        Returns:
        certificate record or null if there is not record available for this certificate

      • addCertificate

        void addCertificate​(org.bouncycastle.cert.X509CertificateHolder certificate)
             throws IOException
        Add a certificate to the certificate repository.
        Parameters:
        certificate - certificate to add to the repository
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure to add the certificate

      • revokeCertificate

        void revokeCertificate​(BigInteger serialNumber,
                       int reason,
                       Date revocationTime)
                throws CertificateRevocationException
        Revoke a certificate at a particular date at a particular time.
        Parameters:
        serialNumber - certificate serial number
        reason - revocation reason or -1 to unrevoke a certificate with current reason certificateHold
        revocationTime - revocation time
        Throws:
        CertificateRevocationException - error revoking the certificate with the specified serial number

      • getCRLRevocationDataProvider

        CRLRevocationDataProvider getCRLRevocationDataProvider()
        Get CRL revocation data provider. This is only present if the CA supports CRL publishing.
        Returns:
        a CRLRevocationDataProvider if present or else null

      • getCertificateCount

        int getCertificateCount​(boolean notRevoked)
        Get the number of certificates in the certificate repository.
        Parameters:
        notRevoked - true to count only the current not revoked certificates and false for the count of all certificates in the repository
        Returns:
        number of certificates

      • getCertificateRange

        List<CertificateRecord> getCertificateRange​(int page,
                                            int pageSize,
                                            boolean notRevoked,
                                            SortBy sortBy,
                                            boolean descending)
        Get a range of certificates from the certificate repository.
        Parameters:
        page - the index of the page of certificates to return
        pageSize - the size of each page of certificates
        notRevoked - true if the pages of certificates holds only not revoked certificates
        sortBy - set to define sorting preferences or null if unsorted
        descending - true for descending order and false for ascending
        Returns:
        list of certificates in the selected page

      • removeExpiredCerts

        List<BigInteger> removeExpiredCerts​(int gracePeriodSeconds)
                             throws IOException
        Remove all expired certificates that has been expired for at least the specified grace period.
        Parameters:
        gracePeriodSeconds - number of seconds a certificate can be expired without being removed
        Returns:
        list of the serial numbers of the certificates that were removed from the repository
        Throws:
        IOException - error processing request
